dataLink.name: Ozone and stratospheric water vapour concentration databases for CMIP6

availability.description: Ozone and Stratospheric Water Vapour Data
availability.name: Ozone and stratospheric water vapour concentration databases for CMIP6

description:
Constant pre-industrial tropospheric and stratospheric ozone climatology.
Models without interactive ozone chemistry should specify the pre-industrial ozone fields from a  data set produced from a pre-industrial control simulation that uses 1850 emissions and a mean solar forcing averaged over solar cycles 8-10, representative of the mean mid-19th century solar forcing.
name: Pre-Industrial Ozone Concentrations
